hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying: Sacrifice only a full-grown animal unless it is difficult for you, in which case sacrifice a lamb

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَجُوزُ مِنَ السِّنِّ فِي الضَّحَايَا
chapter.eng-name: What Is Allowed Regarding Age For The Udhiyyah (Sacrifice)
